headline: Align Technology Governance Shift And iTero Integration Reshape Clinic Workflows
summary: Align Technology (NasdaqGS:ALGN) has adopted amended bylaws that expand the ability of major shareholders to formally request special shareholder meetings. The change gives large, long term investors a clearer path to raise issues between annual meetings. The company also completed a major integration of its iTero intraoral scanners with Henry Schein One’s Dentrix and Dentally platforms. This integration connects Align’s scanner data with widely used dental practice management software used...

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell ALGN and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Align Technology’s 33.2% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 26.1%, and its stock price has climbed to $189.19 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: Assessing Align Technology (ALGN) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Align Technology (ALGN) is drawing fresh attention after its recent share price move, with the stock up about 13% over the past month and roughly 29% in the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Align Technology. At a share price of US$189.20, Align Technology has recently shown stronger short-term momentum, with a 30-day share price return of 13.27% and a 90-day share price return of 28.54%, even though its 1-year total shareholder return of 1.85% and 5-year total shareholder return of...
